name: Assassin
description: A path focused on stealth and deadly precision

skills.name: Assassinate
skills.description: When a surprised creature or a creature from which you are hidden takes damage from your attack, it must make a Strength challenge roll. On a failure, it takes damage equal to its Health.

skills.name: Disguise Expertise
skills.description: If you have a disguise kit, you can use an action to expend a use from the kit to don a disguise.

skills.name: Quick Reflexes
skills.description: You can use a triggered action on your turn to hide or retreat.

skills.name: Manufacture Poison
skills.description: You can use an action and an alchemist's kit to create a dose of poison. You must spend at least 1 minute concentrating, during which time you use the kit and special ingredients worth 5 cp. At the end of this time, you create one dose of poison. The poison retains potency until you complete a rest.

skills.name: Killer's Eye
skills.description: You can use an action on your turn to choose one creature within long range from which you are hidden. Make a Perception challenge roll. On a success, you know where best to attack the target for 1 minute. Until the effect ends, when you attack the target, you make your attack roll with 1 boon and the attack deals 2d6 extra damage.
